title: Calories in NY Strip Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in NY strip steak per serving, including protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
assumptions: 8 oz (227 g) cooked NY strip steak, broiled, choice grade, trimmed to 1/8" fat, no added seasonings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and portion size. Check labels or USDA data for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One 8 oz NY strip steak has about 568 kcal and 56 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Grilled with marinade (1 tbsp soy sauce)

faqs.q: How many calories in one NY strip steak?
faqs.a: About 568 kcal for an 8 oz cooked serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein in NY strip?
faqs.a: Roughly 56 g protein per 8 oz steak.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in NY strip?
faqs.a: Yes; broiling or grilling keeps it lower than pan-frying with oil.

faqs.q: How much fat is in NY strip steak?
faqs.a: About 37.5 g total fat per 8 oz, including 14.8 g saturated.
Per 100 g cooked: 250 kcal, scalable to your portion size.
